markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Axiomatic](/Equipment.aspx?ID=291)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Lawful" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=99" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 583 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,400 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a weapon without an   anarchic  rune 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Complex and symmetrical, an _axiomatic_ rune imbues a weapon with lawful energy. A weapon with this rune deals an additional 1d6 lawful damage against chaotic targets. If you are chaotic, you are enfeebled 2 while carrying or wielding this weapon. 

When you critically succeed at an attack roll with this weapon against a chaotic creature, instead of rolling, count each weapon damage die as average damage rounded up (3 for d4, 4 for d6, 5 for d8, 6 for d10, 7 for d12).

**Craft Requirements** You are lawful.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Axiomatic
